title: BTC Market Snapshot — $65,371 (-3.13% 24h)
summary:
Live price: $65,371 (24h: -3.13%).
24h range: $65,243 – $68,309.
Momentum: bearish over the last day; watch whether price holds above the 65k area.
prediction: Next 24–48h: likely consolidation with a bearish bias while below ~$68,309. If BTC holds above support (~$65,243) and reclaims $66k–$67k, a bounce toward ~$68k is plausible. A clean break below ~$65,243 increases downside risk toward the $63k–$64k zone.
